member.name: T:System.Reactive.Linq.IQbservable`1
member.summary: Provides functionality to evaluate queries against a specific data source wherein the type of the data is known.

member.name: T:System.Reactive.Linq.IQbservable
member.summary: Provides functionality to evaluate queries against a specific data source wherein the type of the data is not specified.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Linq.IQbservable.ElementType
member.summary: Gets the type of the element(s) that are returned when the expression tree associated with this instance of IQbservable is executed.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Linq.IQbservable.Expression
member.summary: Gets the expression tree that is associated with the instance of IQbservable.

member.name: P:System.Reactive.Linq.IQbservable.Provider
member.summary: Gets the query provider that is associated with this data source.

member.name: T:System.Reactive.Linq.IQbservableProvider
member.summary: Defines methods to create and execute queries that are described by an IQbservable object.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.IQbservableProvider.CreateQuery``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Constructs an IQbservable>TResult< object that can evaluate the query represented by a specified expression tree.
member.returns: IQbservable object that can evaluate the given query expression.

member.name: M:System.Reactive.Linq.Qbservable.AsQbservable``1(System.IObservable{``0})
member.summary: Converts an observable sequence into a queryable observable sequence.
member.returns: Queryable observable sequence representing the given observable source sequence.
